author: kou
msg: Add built DLL dir to PATH environment variable to run tests of
Split setup methods and call them.

author: kou
msg: Fix the Ruby bindings' test failures related line break on Windows.
(SvnFsTest#test_delta): Normalize line breaks of diff inputs and
check sum targets because they are wrote to files in text mode.

author: kou
msg: Fix the Ruby bindings test problem that temporary directory can't be
removed at exit because DLLs are still loaded.
Use PATH environment variable instead of copying DLL.

author: kfogel
msg: * notes/sparse-directories.txt: ...to here, in preparation for merge to trunk.

author: kfogel
msg: Convert all branch-specific "### TODO: " comments to "### TODO(sd): ",
so it'll be easy to find sparse-directories items after merging to trunk.
